descriptions.en: It has a vicious temperament, contrary to what its appearance may suggest. It wraps its long bodies around prey, then drags the prey into its den.
descriptions.es: It has a vicious temperament, contrary to what its appearance may suggest. It wraps its long bodies around prey, then drags the prey into its den.
descriptions.ca: Té un temperament ferotge, contràriament al que la seva aparença podria suggerir. Enrotlla els seus cossos llargs al voltant de la presa, i després l'arrossega cap a la seva cova.
